author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a quick follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46361.
Restructuring gain validation unit test:
   * make `G2GainsValidator` an executable
   * restructuring unit test `SiStripG2GainsValidator`
   * improve handling of failure in connecting to cmsweb
   * improve `SiStripG2GainsValidator` script

#### PR validation:

`scram b runtests_test_SiStripG2GainsValidator` runs fine.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: Restructure `test_SiStripG2GainsValidator`
